name: DysConnect
description:
DysConnected is a game made for the NeoCity Cyberpunk Game Jam, and was thought up initially for a larger team project to be made over the period of a month.
However, as time grew shorter and shorter the original plan, to make a game as a Unity FPS game, didn't come to fruition. Our team finally disbanded four days before the deadline of the Jam.

Taking some of my demo assets, I threw together this game over a matter of four days. Yes, it is an RPGMaker game and no, it is not what I was hoping to make, but I am still pretty proud of it and happy with the amount I have learned over the past month. I hope you all enjoy it!
